variables.input: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | fields json.companyName | dedup json.companyName
fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | fields json.industryType | dedup json.industryType
fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter in(json.industryType, $JourneyType) | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | fields json.stepName | dedup json.stepName

0.content:
# Banking
## Fraud Resolution - Business Observability Dashboard

**Industry:** Retail Banking | **Domain:** https://www.banking.com

1.content:
## üîÑ Customer Journey Flow

**1. SuspiciousActivityNotification** **‚Üí** **2. CustomerResponse** **‚Üí** **3. IdentityVerification** **‚Üí** **4. AccountLockdown** **‚Üí** **5. AccountRecovery** **‚Üí** **6. RestorationAndMonitoring**

---
*End-to-end journey visualization with step-by-step metrics*

2.title: üìä Journey Step Metrics (All Steps)
2.query:
fetch bizevents 
| filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" 
| filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*"
| summarize 
 
    OrdersInStep = count(),
    SuccessRate = (countIf(isNull(additionalfields.hasError) or additionalfields.hasError == false) / count()) * 100,
    AvgTimeInStep = avg(additionalfields.processingTime),
    ErrorsInStep = countIf(additionalfields.hasError == true),
    ErrorRate = (countIf(additionalfields.hasError == true) / count()) * 100
  , by: {json.stepName}
| sort OrdersInStep desc

3.query: data record(a="Overall Journey Performance - All Steps")

4.title: üíº Total Journey Events (All Steps)
4.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | summarize total = count()

5.title: ‚úÖ Overall Success Rate
5.query:
fetch bizevents 
| filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" 
| filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" 
| summarize 
    success = countIf(isNull(additionalfields.hasError) or additionalfields.hasError == false),
    total = count()
| fieldsAdd rate = (success / total) * 100

6.title: üí∞ Total Revenue (All Steps)
6.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | summarize revenue = sum(additionalfields.orderTotal)

7.title: ‚ùå Total Errors (All Steps)
7.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | summarize errors = countIf(additionalfields.hasError == true)

8.title: üìà Journey Events Over Time (All Steps)
8.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | makeTimeseries events = count(), bins:30

9.title: üìä Events by Step (All Steps)
9.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | summarize count = count(), by: {json.stepName} | sort count desc | limit 10

10.query: data record(a="Filtered View - By Selected Step")

11.title: üíº Total Journey Events (Filtered)
11.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | filter in(json.stepName,$Step) | summarize total = count()

12.title: üí∞ Total Revenue (Filtered)
12.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | filter in(json.stepName,$Step) | summarize revenue = sum(additionalfields.orderTotal)

13.title: üíµ Avg Order Value
13.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | filter in(json.stepName,$Step) | summarize avg = avg(additionalfields.orderTotal)

14.title: üìà Avg Customer LTV
14.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | filter in(json.stepName,$Step) | summarize ltv = avg(additionalfields.customerLifetimeValue)

15.title: üìà Journey Events Over Time
15.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | filter in(json.stepName,$Step) | makeTimeseries events = count(), bins:30

16.title: üìä Events by Step
16.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | summarize count = count(), by: {json.stepName} | sort count desc | limit 10

19.title: üì± Device Types
19.query: fetch bizevents | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | filter in(json.stepName,$Step) | summarize count = count(), by: {additionalfields.deviceType}

21.title: üéØ Conversion Rate
21.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | filter in(json.stepName,$Step) | summarize rate = avg(additionalfields.conversionRate) * 100

22.title: ‚≠ê Net Promoter Score
22.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | filter in(json.stepName,$Step) | summarize nps = avg(toDouble(additionalfields.netPromoterScore))

23.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è High Churn Risk %
23.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | filter in(json.stepName,$Step) | summarize highRisk = countIf(additionalfields.churnRisk == "high"), total = count() | fieldsAdd pct = (toDouble(highRisk) / toDouble(total)) * 100

24.title: üí° Avg Engagement
24.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | filter in(json.stepName,$Step) | summarize eng = avg(additionalfields.engagementScore)

25.title: üíé Customer Segments
25.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | filter in(json.stepName,$Step) | summarize count = count(), by: {additionalfields.customerSegmentValue}

26.title: üè¢ Market Segments Revenue
26.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | filter in(json.stepName,$Step) | summarize revenue = sum(additionalfields.orderTotal), by: {additionalfields.marketSegment}

28.title: üì± Device Types
28.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | filter in(json.stepName,$Step) | summarize count = count(), by: {additionalfields.deviceType}

29.title: üåç Top Locations by Revenue
29.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | filter in(json.stepName,$Step) | summarize events = count(), revenue = sum(additionalfields.orderTotal), by: {additionalfields.location} | sort revenue desc | limit 10

31.title: ‚è±Ô∏è P90 Processing Time
31.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | filter in(json.stepName,$Step) | summarize p90 = percentile(additionalfields.processingTime, 90)

32.title: üíµ Avg Operational Cost
32.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | filter in(json.stepName,$Step) | summarize cost = avg(toDouble(additionalfields.operationalCost))

33.title: üîã Avg Resource Utilization
33.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | filter in(json.stepName,$Step) | summarize util = avg(additionalfields.resourceUtilization) * 100

34.title: ‚ö° Avg Efficiency Rating
34.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | filter in(json.stepName,$Step) | summarize eff = avg(toDouble(additionalfields.efficiencyRating))

35.title: üí∞ Revenue vs Cost Trend
35.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | filter in(json.stepName,$Step) | makeTimeseries revenue = sum(additionalfields.orderTotal), cost = sum(toDouble(additionalfields.operationalCost)), bins:20

36.title: üîç Recent Journey Events (Detailed)
36.query: fetch bizevents | filter event.kind == "BIZ_EVENT" | filter json.companyName == "Banking" | filter json.industryType == $JourneyType or $JourneyType == "*" | filter in(json.stepName,$Step) | fields timestamp, json.customerId, json.stepName, json.correlationId, additionalfields.orderTotal, additionalfields.deviceType, additionalfields.location, additionalfields.churnRisk, additionalfields.engagementScore, additionalfields.customerLifetimeValue | sort timestamp desc

37.content: *Dashboard auto-generated by BizObs Engine* | Monitoring Banking journey performance across all touchpoints
